errorNotPlayer: You must be a player to use the [commandName] command!
errorNoSubcommandProvided:
You must specify which subcommand you want to use!

For help, try: /nation help
errorBadSubcommand:
I could not find that subcommand!
For help, try: /nation help
errorCanNotRunOnYourself: You can not run this command on yourself.
errorNationBadPermissions: You must be at least a [minimumRole] to execute that command.
errorNationNotInNation: You must be in a nation to execute that command.
errorNationNoPlayerFound: No user found with the name [playerName]!
errorNationCreateNoNameProvided:
You must provide a name for your nation.
Format: /nation create [name]
Example: /nation create My Cool Nation
errorNationCreateAlreadyInNation: You must leave your current nation before creating a new one!
nationInviteInvited: You have been invited to join [nationName] by [inviterName]!
errorNationInviteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To invite a user to your nation please specify their name!
Format: /nation invite [username]
Example: /nation invite connor7000
errorNationJoinManual: This is an automated command, ask someone to invite you, then click on the accept button.
errorNationJoinExpired: This invitation has expired; ask for a new one!
errorNationLeaveIsChancellor:
You may not leave a nation which you are the chancellor of.
You may either appoint a new chancellor with: /nation appoint [name].
Or you may disband your nation with: /nation disband
errorNationPromoteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To promote a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation promote [username]
Example: /nation promote connor7000
errorNationDemoteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To demote a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation demote [username]
Example: /nation demote connor7000
